data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Rongtao, Wang, Zhiwei, Wang, Jun, Zhu, Xinxin, Xu, Han (2019): Isotrema sanyaense, a new species of Aristolochiaceae from Hainan, China. PhytoKeys 128: 85-96, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.128.35042, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.128.35042
